name: Dreamgame (thespookfish)
description:
This is my first experience interacting with Gamemaker a few years ago.  I have generally made music and sounds as "The Spookfish".  I tried to re-create dreams I've had as well as stories others have told me of things with my very limited drawing abilities.   I made some sounds specifically for this game and some are from the past.  

there are 13 screens you can find (including the ending screen)

**the all black and white room has a sort-of cover of the song "saturn" by yours are the only ears
